Request Generator

Request_generator.Generate(seed_no, nodes, holding_time_mean, inter_arrival_time_mean, req_no, slot_list)[source]

Generates every request with the necessary information inside each request.

Parameters

  • seed_no (int) – The simulation seed number

  • nodes (list) – A list of nodes

  • holding_time_mean (int) – The holding time mean

  • inter_arrival_time_mean (int) – The arrival time mean

  • req_no (int) – Number of requests to be created

  • slot_list – The slot list

Returns

Every request generated

Return type

dict
